assessment_item.subject: Microbiology
assessment_item.title: 7PD3KIQ4 குறைந்த அலைநீளத்தை உள்ளடக்கிய கதிர்வீச்சு________
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

குறைந்த அலைநீளத்தை உள்ளடக்கிய கதிர்வீச்சு________

 

 

 

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

UV மற்றும் அகச்சிவப்பு

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1611"},{"text":"

புற ஊதா மற்றும் நுண் அலைகள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1612"},{"text":"

அகச்சிவப்பு மற்றும் ரேடியோ அலைகள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1622"},{"text":"

புற ஊதா மற்றும் X கதிர்கள்

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1627"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":true,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"7PD3KIQ4 குறைந்த அலைநீளத்தை உள்ளடக்கிய கதிர்வீச்சு________","title":"7PD3KIQ4 குறைந்த அலைநீளத்தை உள்ளடக்கிய கதிர்வீச்சு________","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"Tamil","gradeLevel":["Class 11"],"subject":"Microbiology","qlevel":"MEDIUM","contentType":"Resource","mimeType":"application/vnd.ekstep.ecml-archive","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":true,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
